allSaves.value: +1 status bonus to all save vs magic

modifiers.label: +1 Status Bonus to all Saves vs. Magic
+1 Status Bonus to all Saves vs. Magic
+1 Status Bonus to all Saves vs. Magic

items.name: +1 Status Bonus to all Saves vs. Magic

description.value: When targeted with cold damage, resisted or not, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of their next turn.

If a maching horde is subjected to an effect that calms emotions and fails their saving throw against it, they take @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage for each round they remain affected by it. As an action, a creature can attempt to calm it with Diplomacy as if Making an Impression. A success also deals @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage and causes the marching horde to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of their next turn.

Trigger Receive any fire damage, resisted or not.

Effect Enter rage as per barbarian ability until the end of their next turn.

Trigger A creature Strikes the marching horde with a piercing or slashing weapon.

Effect The triggering creature makes a @Check[fortitude|dc:23].

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to this effect from this marching horde for an hour.

Success The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} until the end of their next turn.

Failure As a success, but the random target they select must be a friendly target if available.

Critical Failure As failure, but the duration is 2 rounds.
When used on a visible target within 30 feet that is under the effect of rage, the marching horde gains 10 temporary hit points and the rage ends.
